item_name: JBL Cinema SB160 2.1 Channel soundbar with wireless subwoofer
item_desc:
JBL Cinema SB160  2.1 Channel soundbar with wireless subwoofer

Extra Bass. Extraordinary sound.
The JBL Cinema SB160 features 220W system power, Dolby Digital, Optical and HDMI ARC, four powerful full range drivers and comes with a wireless subwoofer. Enjoy impressive, balanced sound with extra deep bass for movies and music entertainment. Plus, it’s Bluetooth-enabled so you can play your favorite music wirelessly from any smartphone, tablet or laptop and features a one cable HDMI ARC connection that ensures a hassle-free user experience.


Spesifikasi General
Power supply 100 - 240VAC, ~ 50/60Hz
Total speaker power output (Max. @THD 1%) 220W
Soundbar power output (Max. @THD 1%) 2 x 52W
Subwoofer power output (Max. @THD 1%) 116W
Soundbar transducer 2 x (48 x 90)mm racetrack driver + 2 x 0.5" tweeter
Subwoofer transducer 5.25", wireless sub
Operating temperature 0°C - 45°C


Spesifikasi Audio
Max SPL 82dB
Frequency response 40Hz - 20kHz
Audio inputs 1 Optical, Bluetooth (USB is for Service only.)


Video Specifications
HDMI Video output (With Audio return channel) 1
HDMI HDCP version 1.4


Apa yang ada di dalam kotak
    Soundbar
    Wireless subwoofer
    Remote control with batteries
    Power cords 
    HDMI cable
    Wall-mount bracket kit with screws
    Quick start guide
    Safety sheet


Ukuran
Soundbar dimensions (W x H x D) 900 x 67 x 63(mm) / 35.4" x 2.6" x 2.5"
Subwoofer dimensions (W x H x D) 170 x 345 x 313(mm) / 6.7" x 13.6" x 12.3"
Packaging dimensions (W x H x D) 975 x 195 x 445mm / 38.4" x 6.7" x 17.5"
